name: Boxwrecker Arena
description:
Boxwrecker Arena is a dynamic platformer with a very steep difficulty curve. You will control an unmanned drone on a semispherical mount that will move forward through many challenges. The main twist is that the level is also moving towards you so you have to be fast and perceptive. Try your wits in the tests that will lead you to become a Boxwrecking Champion!

Main features:

  • 50 levels of increasingly higher difficulty in the Tournament Mode and 10 more designed for other game modes
  • Challenge Mode that will let you play all the other levels with unique twists - the level will try to beat just like you are trying to beat it - it only ends with your patience
  • Custom Game Mode that lets you create your own rules - like more gravity and an occasional box that falls on your drone
  • Local Multiplayer mode to show which of your friends is the best... that is, best after you
  • Powerful Level Editor that lets you create challenges much like the ones in the game - or better if you can
  • Customizable drone that can be painted differently and wear cool hats that you unlock as you play

Will you become the best that the Boxwrecking world has ever seen? Your scores in the Challenge Mode will be shown on the global leaderboards. Top ten players will always be visible in the game!
